description: Speed up your computer in {{city_upper}} with SSD and RAM upgrades, thermal servicing, and performance tuning. Extend the life of your hardware with practical improvements.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Running out of RAM slows the system even if the CPU is not busy.
Replacing a mechanical hard drive with an SSD can improve load times.
Many laptops can support more RAM and faster storage than they shipped with by default.
Firmware and BIOS updates can improve hardware compatibility, stability, and even performance.
Dust buildup and degraded thermal paste cause overheating, which triggers thermal throttling and reduces performance.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We upgrade and optimize PCs and laptops to improve speed, stability, and lifespan. We handle parts sourcing, installation, and testing to ensure reliable results.
Our service includes diagnostics, careful hardware installation, firmware updates, and performance tuning so you get measurable improvements.

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We inspect your current system and recommend the most cost-effective upgrades. After sourcing quality parts, we install, test, and verify stability.
You receive a faster, quieter machine along with a clear report of the work performed.
